html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03972018-04-03,  ,  ECCC,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder Adding TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to enable the Government to propose risk management instruments under the CEPA, should such instruments be deemed necessary to manage the human health risks associated with LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GASES.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0067 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
precis: Order Adding TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to enable the Government to propose risk management instruments under the CEPA, should such instruments be deemed necessary to manage the human health risks associated with LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GASES.
